name: ORBITOR
description: Navigate the mysterious Quantum Nebula and dismantle it's gravity machine piece by piece before it destroys The Galaxy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Quad Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX460/ATI Radeon HD 5850 (512MB minimum) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 2300 or AMD FX6120 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 Ti or Radeon HD 6970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
